Name: Super Hipster Lumberjack
About the game: You can't beat this game!!! Super Hipster Lumberjack is a love letter to very difficult flash platformers. It is a collaboration of ideas I have had since I was a kid and the games I have always enjoyed playing. In this story Noah attempts to make a game for the first time. He then gets trapped in his own creation. He learns that making games is a lot harder than he thought. Note From Dev (2021): This is a game I made while I was in high school. It meant a lot to me that so many people were very supportive of this game when it came out. I don't know if I'd be making games today without getting to have the experience of finishing and releasing SHL. Since making this game I've gotten to apply everything I've learned into making even better games and will continue to as long as I can. This year 2021, I released a Monster RPG called Entodrive! / That game's creation wasn't possible without the support given to SHL, so from the bottom of my heart, thank you!
